CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: charge
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The charged particle coating disrupts armor and tissue in equal measure.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: concentrated charge
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Focuses charged particles around the tip of the core for improved armor penetration at the cost of stopping power.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: ion charge
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to combat mechanoids, the round creates an electrical current on impact, disrupting electronic systems temporarily.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with incendiary agent that ignites after impact.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: thermobaric
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with high-explosive aerosol that causes a large explosion and ignites flammable materials.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: foam
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Special round designed for civilian fire-fighting purposes. Filled with fire-retardant foam to suppress fires in a large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: antigrain warhead
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A tiny ultra-tech warhead usually used by spacecraft or glitterworld war machines. Powered by a grain of antimatter, it creates a huge explosion and starts fires around the target.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: radioactive (ionising)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Contains ionising gamma radiation that significantly impairs consciousness, and is a carcinogen.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: tranquilizer
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Special round designed for non-lethal engagements of targets. Filled with fast-acting sedatives and tipped with a hypodermic needle.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: forsaken arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to be fired from a forsaken bow.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: APB Plasma
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Neutrally-charged particle beam capable of devastating burn effects.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Railgun sabot
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.
